Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Relates to the availability of opioid reversal agents
Summary: Relates to the availability of opioid reversal agents; requires the department of health to make available any formulation and dosage of opioid reversal agents approved by the federal food and drug administration.
LawCode: Amd §19.09, Ment Hyg L; amd §3309, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law and the public health law, in relation to the availability of opioid reversal agents
